final int MAX_POGING = 5
 Maximum number of times to try resending data.

Detailed Description

Timer class added because a transmitter must know how long it has to wait for an acknowledge of the receiver.

Member Function Documentation

Timeout reached. Try five times to send the data again.

e timer event that triggers this function.
